original_text:
“Judah’s sin is engraved with an iron tool,
    inscribed with a flint point,
on the tablets of their hearts
    and on the horns of their altars.
korean_text: 유다의 죄는 금강석 끝 철필로 기록되되 그들의 마음 판과 그들의 제단 뿔에 새겨졌거늘

sentences.original_text: Judah's sin is engraved with an iron tool
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 죄가 철 도구로 새겨져 있으며

sentences.original_text: on the tablets of their hearts
and on the horns of their altars
